name: Retrieve the Relationship Management Details for Customer with Branch Staff RM

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930000154000"

When I Retrieve the Relationship Management Details for CIF Key: <cifKey>
| cifKey | notes |
| 0100000930000154000 | Customer with Branch Staff RM |

Then the following data Relationship Management Information should be returned
| relationshipManager | rmStaffID | treatmentFlag | rmEmail | rmPhone | lifetimeValue | marketSegment | treatmentStrategy | mgmtLocation |
| David Harte | 15061 | B | david.harte@mail.ebs.ie | (025) 24400 |  | D | FSG | BRANCH_RM |

children.description: Validate response: | relationshipManager | rmStaffID | treatmentFlag | rmEmail | rmPhone | lifetimeValue | marketSegment | treatmentStrategy | mgmtLocation | | David Harte | 15061 | B | david.harte@mail.ebs.ie | (025) 24400 | | D | FSG | BRANCH_RM |
